alert.note: Alert for Heard; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:14AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Heard and Troup Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 914 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Southern Harbor, or near Lanett, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Hogansville, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Piedmont Heights, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Big Springs, Wares Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad and Long Cane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
